content.body: Yeah we haven't settled on firm guidance yet, but making it a fully public room seems to be the best thing right now
We have settled on all technical discussion in official spaces always being public and logged, without exception
i think creating the channel and then asking chairs to add it to the space (and also have it logged?) seems like a great approach
We should have that as written guidance with instructions for how to set up a channel correctly, in how-we-work or something
Related to this is whether we are going to keep using view.matrix.org or bakkot’s custom logging application (or both).
content.formatted_body: Related to this is whether we are going to keep using view.matrix.org or bakkot’s custom logging application (or both).

content.body: view.matrix.org is already there for everything on the server that's public. We should probably change the topic link to bakkot's logs, though.
also if you would like me to log a channel let me know
